EmailTemplate.description: IN USE This email is sent to Primary applicant to Review Application Request
EmailTemplate.name: GG Review Application Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Review Application Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Application {!ApplicationReview__c.ApplicationId__c} for the Funding Opportunity# {!ApplicationReview__c.FundingOpportunity__c} is ready for your review.
Hello {!Application__c.PrimaryApplicant__c},
The Application {!ApplicationReview__c.ApplicationId__c} has been assigned to you for your review. Please login to EGMS System to complete the review.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
